text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And here's undefeated Triple Crown hopeful Mihono Bourbon, 
making her appearance at Kyoto Racecourse!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon! Show us the birth of a Triple Crown legend!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: We believe in you!

Rice Shower versus Mihono Bourbon. This Kikuka Sho will settle their 
rivalry once and for all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Just keep following Bourbon… Just keep following… Just follow, and 
then…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower… I see you already have me marked.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No matter. I will be first across the finish.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Not today. I won't lose again.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Rice! You got this!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
The Kikuka Sho. 3,000 meters on turf. Long distance is Rice's 
strength, which means she has a chance, right?

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but there's no way Bourbon doesn't have something up her 
sleeve.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey Trainer, what'd you tell Rice?
I told her to keep following Bourbon, then pass her.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh… Wait, that's it?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hard to find fault with that advice. Her ability to stalk a leader is 
second to none.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …If anything, I'm less concerned about if she can beat Bourbon, and more about how the crowd will—

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Cheers!
McQueen is cut off by another tidal wave of cheers. It's almost time.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The crowning glory of the Classics is on the line here in the Kikuka 
Sho. And it all starts now!
